name: Mind Riders Technology
tagline: Web and Mobile Applications Development Company
description:
Established in 2007, Mind Riders Technology is an expert mobile and web application development company headquartered in U.S., Gujarat and presence in Maharashtra, Kolkata, India. We embarked on a journey to tap the potential of mobile computing and smartphones and to become a specialist provider of end-to-end solutions in mobile application development.
We started focusing on iPhone app development, gained valuable experience, proved our mettle and established our mark by developing apps that went on to become chart busters.
